comment._content:
Great image - very atmospheric. Some related pics.

Wilts. Reg. on way to front:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/swindonlocal/3861977212/]

And a stereoview of them in action c1900 during the Boer War at Orange River:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/swindonlocal/3909867395/]
